name: 3D - Cosmic Aurora: 03
description:
I long for a drink of clarity but do nothing more than what gives a hazy glimpse of something better. I submerge myself in a bath hoping to see the spark of a bathroom light filter through drops spilled across skin,

but only see bubbles,

air confined in a makeshift space.

 

Why then do I reach for bubbles when all I get is soap seeped into skin? What is hope in a time of despair when it’s as      weightless      as a breath, never making impact? Why submerge myself under the ocean, look up to see the water-morphed sun, and think it’s more beautiful

 

then,

 

 

 

than when I was surfaced?







It has 2 effects:

1. The image it is!
2. If you have some 3D glasses lying around, try one on and look at the image! Just make sure that you are using the retro 3D glasses. The red and blue kind.

The image in 3D creates depth and a portal into the image to make it look like a window into a new dimension! So if you want get the 3D glasses and try it out!

Width: 900px
Height: 900px

Original Image: 3968 x 2976
Exposure Time: 1/6410s
Focal Length: 26mm
ISO Speed: 100
F-Stop: f/2.2
Camera: DJI Mavic Pro
Location: Switzerland
